attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Labour Party under Gordon Brown have proved to us that they are not able to lead the country any longer in an authoritative or logical way with ridiculous schemes such as: abolishing the 10p rate of tax; highest fuel duty in Europe, new proposals for a 'green' car tax, holding terror suspects for 42 days; the state of the UK economy; the amount of illegal immigrants that are living here and so on. If Gordon Brown has nothing to fear then he will accept a petition for an early General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
